JSRDotNETSDK Reference

InstrumentOpenCriteria Properties

InstrumentOpenCriteria Class  See Also

The following tables list the members exposed by the InstrumentOpenCriteria type.

Properties
Name Description
AllowedInterfaces Gets the list of allowed interface types that can be used by this plugin. The default value for this property is all of the supported interfaces.
ModelName The model name of the instrument(s) to be opened, or NULL if any model is acceptable. Examples model names are DPR500, DPR300, PRC50, etc.
PortsToExclude If the library is for a family of instruments which connect via serial port, this would be a list of serial port names like COM3. If this list is null or empty, then no ports are excluded in the search for an instrument. For connection types, this may not be used, such as USB.
PortsToInclude If the library is for a family of instruments which connect via serial port, this would be a list of serial port names like COM3. If this list is null or empty (the default value), then all ports are included in the search for an instrument. For connection types, this may not be used, such as USB. In a possible future ethernet model, it could be a list of IP address and port numbers, etc.
SerialNumber The SerialNumber of the instrument to be opened, or NULL (or alternatively an empty string) if any are acceptable.
guid The model name of the instrument(s) to be opened, or NULL if any model is acceptable. Examples model names are DPR500, DPR300, PRC50, etc.
